name: The Slither
description:
A young hiker is on a camping trip, looking for new adventures. He decides to check out the Forbidden Woods, which is said to be haunted by a Banshee known as "The Slither"! Many stories tell that people never return.. those who have, were horrified of what they encountered! However, this hiker didn't believe in any of that and now he's trapped! Forced to face the abomination! He will be forced to solve mysterious puzzles, use strategy to keep the banshee at bay and maybe even travel across dimensions to escape! Just remember, The Slither is always behind you... even if you can't see her!

Will he make it out or just become another victim of The Slither!?
